issue.title: [Packaging] Add a log subcommand to crossbow to get the build logs of tasks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2933](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2933). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For people who don't want to have to click on things (myself included), a `crossbow` subcommand that allows task log tailing would be most welcome.
